method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the FormField.

parameters.name: layer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to create the FormField. (Optional)

parameters.name: at
parameters.shortdesc: The location at which to insert the FormField relative to the reference object or within the container object. (Optional)

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the at parameter is before or after. Can accept: Document, Spread, MasterSpread, Page, Layer or PageItem. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new FormField (Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the FormField with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the FormField with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the FormField with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the FormFields within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The FormField, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: FormField, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The FormField, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: FormField, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first FormField in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last FormField in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle FormField in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the FormField with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the FormField that follows the desired FormField.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the FormField whose index follows the specified FormField in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The FormField whose index comes before the desired FormField.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any FormField in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every FormField in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FormField.
Returns the FormField with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
